Classes in uk.ac.ed.methodius used by uk.ac.ed.methodius
Configuration
          holds the configuration information for Methodius.
ContentList
          ContentList is a list containing the Facts selected for expression from the ContentPotential.
ContentPotential
          Graph made up of Entities and Facts representing limited Content Potential.
CPFact
          Implements a Fact in the content selection process.
DataStore
          handles the database loading, content potential creation and retrieval of objects and limited content potential webs.
Entity
          represents an Entity in the Content Potential.
Expression
           
Fact
          represents a Fact object in the Content Potential.
Log
          Log program output to s.o.
LogicalForms
           
MethodiusRealizer
           
NP
           
Predicate
           
ReferringExpression
          Class to create a Referring Expression for an entity or piece of canned text based on the previous referring expressions in this description and focus information.
ReferringExpressionHistory
          Class to store a history of what referring expressions have been used.
SignificanceHandler
          handles the predicate significance table.
SingleTPFact
          Implements a single fact in the text planning process
TextPlan
           
TPFact
          Implements a Fact in the content selection process.
Type
           
TypeHandler
          Methodius has a type hierarchy.
UserModel
